verses.text: How amiable \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* tabernacles, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* hosts!

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* soul longeth, yea, \w even|strong="H3068"\w* fainteth \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* courts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w My|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* flesh cry \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* living \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="H1571"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sparrow \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H1571"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* house, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* swallow \w a|strong="H3068"\w* nest \w for|strong="H7442"\w* \w herself|strong="H5315"\w*, \w where|strong="H2691"\w* \w she|strong="H3820"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w lay|strong="H5315"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* young, \w Even|strong="H1571"\w* \w thine|strong="H3615"\w* altars, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts, \w My|strong="H3068"\w* King, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Blessed \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H1571"\w* praising \w thee|strong="H4672"\w*. \qs [Selah\qs*

Blessed \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* man whose strength \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thee; \w In|strong="H3427"\w* whose heart \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* highways \add to Zion\add*.

Passing through \w the|strong="H5797"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3824"\w* Weeping \w they|strong="H3824"\w* make it \w a|strong="H3068"\w* place \w of|strong="H3824"\w* springs; Yea, \w the|strong="H5797"\w* early rain covereth it \w with|strong="H3824"\w* blessings.

\w They|strong="H1571"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w from|strong="H5674"\w* strength \w to|strong="H5674"\w* strength; Every \w one|strong="H1571"\w* \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w them|strong="H5674"\w* appeareth \w before|strong="H5674"\w* God \w in|strong="H1571"\w* Zion.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w hosts|strong="H2428"\w*, hear \w my|strong="H7200"\w* prayer; \w Give|strong="H7200"\w* ear, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H2428"\w* Jacob. \qs [Selah\qs*

Behold, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* shield, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H3068"\w* upon \w the|strong="H8085"\w* face \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thine anointed.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* day \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* courts \w is|strong="H6440"\w* better \w than|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand. \w I|strong="H7200"\w* had rather \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* doorkeeper \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* God, \w Than|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* tents \w of|strong="H6440"\w* wickedness.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* God \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sun \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shield: \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* give grace \w and|strong="H3117"\w* glory; No \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w thing|strong="H2896"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* withhold \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* walk uprightly.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts, Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H2896"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* trusteth \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*.
